title: GB Schematics SveltekitRoute Options Schema
description: Creates a new, generic component definition in the given or default project.

path.description: The path at which to create the component file, relative to the current workspace. Default is a folder with the same name as the component in the project root.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the route?

style.description: The value of style element lang attribute

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new route.

endpoint.description: Create an endpoint handler for your route.
